segments.text: The scene is quite chaotic despite the sweet aroma of cookies wafting through the air.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the boy, so focused on the cookie jar, stretching his little hand as far as it can reach.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But then I glance at the woman, her foot already soaked in the puddle and she hasn’t noticed a thing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s as if she’s in a different world, completely detached from the chaos around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children seem to be in their own little adventure, thrilled but oblivious to the risks.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think their giggles must be echoing in their heads, but I can’t hear them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The instability of the stool makes me clench my fists in worry.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's only a matter of time before something goes wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water spilling over is like a metaphor for the chaos that’s about to unfold.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This kitchen holds secrets and risks, and yet there’s an air of innocence about it.
segments.speaker: PAR
